text: is a public high school in Susono, Shizuoka, Japan. This school is usually called . ==History== In 1903 Shizuoka Prefectural Susono High School was established as "Sano Agricultural Mechanics School", then in 1921 it became "Shizuokoa-ken Sano Business School". In 1948 the school was renamed "Shizuoko Prefectural Namazu Agricultural High School Sano Pasture", and finally in 1953 the school "Shizuoka Prefectural Susono High School" became independent from "Shizuoka Prefectural Numazu Agricultural High School". ==Location== The School is located at 410-1118, 901-1 Sano, Susono-shi, Shizuoka-ken, Japan. ==References== ==External links== *Official Website(Japanese) *Shizuoka Prefecture *Susono city (Japanese) Category:High schools in Japan Category:Schools in Shizuoka Prefecture Category:Educational institutions established in 1903
title: Shizuoka Prefectural Susono High School
